Veratis pondered the question for a few minutes, scratched his elderly chin
and with a "HMMM" made a decision. "I will examine your friend and the
technology you have mentioned." He was curious about the new technology even
if he didn't end up useing it he'd still be interested in learning about it.
In his life he'd seen signs of billions of technological civilizations. One
more to add to the total would be a pleasure.

Ice watched and listened to the two, She sensed an intense amount of
emotions at the mention of Stallex, there was more to him than she knew and
for some odd reason she wanted to learn more.
